AppSettings.ResolveMessage: Dear #FirstName#, your Loan Repayment request has been completed successfully.
AppSettings.DeclineMessage: Dear #FirstName#, please note that your Loan Repayment request was declined due to #Reason#. Please visit the nearest Stanbic IBTC Bank Branch.
AppSettings.SubmissionMessage:
Dear #FirstName#,

Your Loan liquidation / repayment request has been successfully submitted with Ticket No #Ticket#.
Please keep this number safe for future reference.

For further enquiries, contact the Customer Contact Centre on 0700 909 909 909 or CustomerCareNigeria@stanbicibtc.com.

Thank you.
